title: 神奇宝贝pokeheal权限节点
author: 领军人物
txt_content:
我玩的是1.12.2的最新版mod
装到服务端后发现原先的  权限节点无法正常使用
求大佬告诉新版的权限节点

不是以下的权限节点
pixelextras.command.pheal
pixelextras.commands.PokeHealCommand
com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.commands.Heal

replies.author: 白可乐
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 白可乐 于 2018-5-14 17:32 编辑 

权限点是：pixelmon.command.pokeheal


这个是目前神奇宝贝的全部基础指令：
/breed: pixelmon.command.breed/checkspawns: pixelmon.command.checkspawns/copyToDB: pixelmon.command.copyToDB/endbattle: pixelmon.command.endbattleAllow /endbattle to be used on other players: pixelmon.command.admin.endbattle
/freeze: pixelmon.command.freeze/givemoney: pixelmon.command.givemoney/givepixelsprite: pixelmon.command.givepixelsprite/pokebattle: pixelmon.command.pokebattle/pokebattle2: pixelmon.command.pokebattle2/pokegive: pixelmon.command.pokegive/pokegiveegg: pixelmon.command.pokegiveegg/pokeheal: pixelmon.command.pokeheal/pokereload: pixelmon.command.pokereload/pokespawn: pixelmon.command.pokespawn/pokesave: pixelmon.command.pokesave/pokestats: pixelmon.command.pokestats/printstore: pixelmon.command.printstore/psnapshot: pixelmon.command.psnapshot/redeem: pixelmon.command.redeem/resetpokestats: pixelmon.commands.resetpokestats/setparty: pixelmon.command.setparty/spectate: pixelmon.command.spectate/struc: pixelmon.command.struc/teach: pixelmon.command.teach/transfer: pixelmon.command.transfer/unlock: pixelmon.command.unlock/warpplate: pixelmon.command.warpplate
